description: These nutty treats are rich, buttery and velvety.
name: Coconut & White Chocolate Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g desiccated coconut, keep half for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot on a medium heat, melt the chocolate with the cream and vanilla for 3 minutes or until melted.
Once melted, remove from the heat and combine the rest of the ingredients only using half of the coconut.
Place in a bowl and allow to cool in the fridge for 2 hours. Place the rest of the coconut in a seperate bowl and remove from mix from the fridge.
Roll your chocolate into about 10 balls and cover fully with the rest of the coconut before serving.
